website_summaries.verdict: Average-sized adults and children alike can enjoy this sea scooter – maybe even on the same day, since the battery lasts up to 2 hours!
pros: Rated for 100 feet deep with speeds of up to 2.5 miles per hour
Up to 2 hours run time with standard use
Removable buoyancy chamber for salt water
Powered by sealed lead acid battery
cons: Can be a challenge to charge and close the battery chamber

customer_reviews.title: Used for 45 minute dive to 100 feet. Used ...
customer_reviews.text: Used for 45 minute dive to 100 feet. Used throughout entire dive due to current. Plenty of battery juice after dive.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Love this item and would buy it again
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item because I love to snorkel so I figured out it will help me to cover more area in shorter time, it gave me about 2 hours and 15 minutes of continuos usage at a great speed, loved the item and will definitely buy it again or recommend it to anyone, I’m 175 lbs and pull me with no problem wonderful color and I was the envy of many on the water.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan mantezoni

customer_reviews.title: A Must Have When Snorkeling!
customer_reviews.text: Loved snorkeling with Yamaha Seascooters! We took the 250 and 300 to Maui and rode them nonstop out far to the coral reefs, snorkeled about an hour running them on and off then rode them back. In one day, they were both used continuously to the snorkeling spot and back and the battery did not die. The 250 pulled my 250lb husband no problem, but the 300 gave him more power. Do not hesitate to buy one, but note that they start to get heavy when hauling them to the water. We also bubble wrapped them, kept them both in the original boxes and checked them on the airplane.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Yamaha should be embarrased
customer_reviews.text: Yamaha should be embarrased to have their name associated with this product. Bought two of them neither worked anywhere close as advertised. Do not waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Marianne Vest

customer_reviews.title: Works for big guys
customer_reviews.text: I am an avid swimmer and diver. This thing is a blast if you have Scuba gear or a great set of lungs. I am roughly 200lbs and this thing gives me some great pull through the water. Strap on a pair of fins and I can easily free dive to 30+ ft easily. Awesome for Scuba, and you can really get going if you are not fighting the current. 10/10 would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Season on/off switch not made well and falls off- poorly made!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in this product. Had to return the first one the very first time I tried to use it as the on /off switch fell off when I put it in the water. You can’t turn it on without it. We replaced it and after using it less than six hours, the same switch had fallen off while using it. The return/exchange date is done with amazon and now we have to deal with the manufacturer, which is a pain. We will have to pay for shipping to repair it and honestly we would just like our money back as we have zero faith that this won’t occur again.
customer_reviews.author: makfam1

customer_reviews.title: Batteries are crap, I sent 2 back and gave up
customer_reviews.text: This thing was great when it worked. I got 3 trips about a mile out and back from the first one. The 4th trip I trusted it, and didn't take fins so I had to swim back in with this piece of crap against the tide when the battery died... I live in the Keys and walk 100 steps to get in the water and go lobstering so I REALLY wanted this thing to work. Yamaha offered to replace the battery, but I trust Amazon more than Yamaha so I shipped it back and ordered a replacement. The very first trip the battery failed on the 2nd unit... I am going to try a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: Florida Keys Guy

customer_reviews.title: I do not recommend. Buy a real scuba unit..
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working second time out in the water. Total garbage. 20 meters and leaks into battery housing and I'm guessing elsewhere, causeing condensation and shorting out ignition causing stuttering and dying prematurely. Power has greatly decreased since first use. Only taken out 4 times to test different fixed for issues.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Expensive toy
customer_reviews.text: Kids like it. Hard to get it to close when replacing the battery
customer_reviews.author: Kirk Lewis

customer_reviews.title: VERY DISAPPOINTED
customer_reviews.text: Used this product 3 times. New out of box. Battery lasted approximately 30 min on first 2 attempts in our pool. Lasted 15 min on 3rd attempt and will now not turn on at all. VERY DISAPPOINTED! Highly anticipated gift for my daughters birthday. Had planned to take on vacation and product is unusable. Attempted to call 800 number on occasion. Unable to get through. Discrepancies in reviews make me think this product is at the very least very inconsistent in performance.
customer_reviews.author: Kassidy Lander

customer_reviews.title: I would think twice anyone buying this product
customer_reviews.text: Worked well but didn’t go as fast as I thought it would but also after following the instructions on charging battery every 3 months after 10 months battery doesn’t keep a charge only used it last summer once charge the battery right away and like clock work and battery still went bad Turns out the battery if fine it’s the charger that doesn’t work no output
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very cool
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love it. Purchased to take on a cruise to the Caribbean. Worked great. It’s heavy so you have to account for how your going to carry it around. (We rented a golf cart on the island, so we strapped it to the back and off we went). Snorkeled Grand Turk with it. Way cool!!’
customer_reviews.author: Ana

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality, excellent performance very solid. Little bit complicated to charge battery but make it secure to keep it dry.
customer_reviews.author: Hernan Parra

customer_reviews.title: Not good at all - broke 2 day.
customer_reviews.text: Worked for less than 2 days and then nothing. Bought a new battery and still does nothing. I’d give it zero stars if possible. This was not worth $10.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: PRODUCT MALFUNCTIONING NO RESPONSE FROM MANUFACTURER
customer_reviews.text: After second use, scooter stopped working. Have called 800 number listed on website as well as sent email with no response. Very disappointing!
customer_reviews.author: Alexander Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Stronger than earlier models.
customer_reviews.text: Performs as expected. I’ve had earlier model for years. This is about the same price but is noticeably stronger. Great for the lake. OH OH PROBLEM,,,,, THIS ONE SINKS. I’VE HAD 4 OF THESE AND THIS IS THE FIRST ONE TO HAE A MANUFACTURING DEFECT. I’M TRY TO FIGURE OUT HOW TO RETURN IT FOR A GOOD ONE.
customer_reviews.author: steve atlanta

customer_reviews.title: A Snorkling Must Have!
customer_reviews.text: We Snorkel a lot. This makes the trip fun and we don't tire as fast. Finding beautiful shells on the bottom of the shore line has become our pleasure.
customer_reviews.author: L. Fisher

customer_reviews.title: NO BATTERY
customer_reviews.text: Arrived with no battery. I'm hoping to order another and this time it comes with the battery.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Yamaha is obviously having an issues with the batteries
customer_reviews.text: We bought 3 of these and had to return 2 of them as the batteries were defective and would not hold a charge. We received 2 replacements and had to send one of those back. Just make sure you check these out and use them a few times before the return window is closed. They are a lot of fun...as long as you can get the battery to work!
customer_reviews.author: lisa brower

customer_reviews.title: GREAT FUN
customer_reviews.text: Took these to Puerto Rico. They performed great. They go fast enough for me. It allows not so good swimmers to go more than a foot away from shore and still feel safe. We took them in a suitcase from Idaho and they made it fine. We never had them die on us so the battery lasts quite a while. A must if you like playing in the water. My husband is a diver and he enjoyed them as well. They are well made - VERY FUN!
customer_reviews.author: coffee lover

customer_reviews.title: Fun we charged but pain to remove and charge battery.
customer_reviews.text: Poor battery housing design, easy leak potential and It’s a pain to change the battery.
customer_reviews.author: Disappointed

customer_reviews.title: Cool but not well made
customer_reviews.text: Was fun while it lasted. 11 months later it's dead. Bought two more to take the Florida keys and only one of them works. Cheap gimmick, definitely would have avoid.
customer_reviews.author: ryan

customer_reviews.title: Ok... I love it.
customer_reviews.text: It scoots. Was not impressed at first, but then i realized how far i went. Doesn't move to fast but moves around enough to have fun. Happy with the scooter. Just keep eye on the time for the battery life(no gauge)
customer_reviews.author: Devon

customer_reviews.title: Grandsons approval
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my grandsons for Christmas. using it in a pool only oldest is 13 and youngest 8. They love it
customer_reviews.author: Shirleyujest

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: Bought this item for our 10 year olds birthday. The grey clip fell off that keeps it air tight it was very loose to begin with & it sunk in the lake. Can’t find replacement parts anywhere!! $600 down the drain because now it’s past the amazon return window!!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Olnick

customer_reviews.title: Very fun
customer_reviews.text: This works great and is very fun to use. Kids love it
customer_reviews.author: mark

customer_reviews.title: Not reliable
customer_reviews.text: Dissatisfied. Runs ok for a while but after six months it began shutting off, even with a full charge. Would only run out of the water.
customer_reviews.author: Austin TX

customer_reviews.title: Does not Last
customer_reviews.text: My son used this scooter 4-5 times, then it no longer would work. Yahmaha will send you to this guy Pierre, but you have to pay to ship it. Cost me over $100 to ship it back. I’d look else where for a good one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I would not recommend
customer_reviews.text: Wanted it for scuba diving, but tried it in my pool first. So the heavier you are the slower the scooter went, but they weren’t very fast to begin with! Also after charging them they would run for about 10 minutes then turn off. Run again for 10 minutes then turn off. Would not recommend this scooter. I returned the two I purchased.
customer_reviews.author: mary sirois

customer_reviews.title: Defective After Using Twice
customer_reviews.text: After using this product on just two occasions in the last 6 months, the propeller got stuck and the engine stopped working. Low quality product for the price that I paid.
customer_reviews.author: Ace Fullerton

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: Purchase two of these units. Used them in pool only and took care of them. Used them a total of 4 periods of 1 week each with primarily children using the units. Units did not last 1 year. Glad I purchased the insurance offered ....... got full refund.
customer_reviews.author: KEVIN WALDRON

customer_reviews.title: Total quality failure
customer_reviews.text: First trip in the water started cutting out after 5 min. The only upside down does it run full speed. I know the product is good so I can only wonder if I got a returned product.!!!!!!!!!! Furious!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Chris C.

customer_reviews.title: SUCKS....
customer_reviews.text: worked a month and crapped out. Just long enough to be outside AMAZON return window. And of course there is NO PHONE NUMBER TO CALL THEM WITH. SUCKY RETURN POLICY
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Brunton

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Received the item on time followed the directions on the battery took it out scallop diving the unit worked flawlessly great investment
customer_reviews.author: Ljg

customer_reviews.title: To refund my money
customer_reviews.text: Alot of steps to charge the battery. I have returned it and the still have not refunded my money.
customer_reviews.author: ChrisAdmin

customer_reviews.title: Quits when put in water?
customer_reviews.text: Purchased two of these. One works fine the other quits when put in water. Real problem with a Seascooter. Am trying to find out how to get it repaired or returned. Note this scooter is not variable speed either on or off.
customer_reviews.author: Rosemary

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun!!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for my son for his birthday and he absolutely loves it. It pulls him around easily and I use it myself, 185 lbs, and it pulls me with ease as well. He uses it every time he is in the pool.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Wehrle

customer_reviews.title: Open box = dropped product and no battery
customer_reviews.text: It was pretty scratched up. Looked like the box had been dropped from a significant height. Also, it did not come with a battery. I ended up returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Ivory

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Not satisfied with the product. Will stop working after few minutes. Returned and seller refuses to make a refund.
customer_reviews.author: G.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Battery doesnt last as long as I thought it would..
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: Works way better than I thought, I'm about 215 pounds and it pulled me around really good.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos R.

customer_reviews.title: The took the field and it has
customer_reviews.text: I can't wait to try this baby out on my next scuba adventure.
customer_reviews.author: Louis Hurt

product_meta.title: YAMAHA Seascooter with Camera Mount Recreational Dive Series Underwater Scooter
product_meta.description:
The Yamaha Seascooter is lightweight and powerful

Designed to cruise at speeds up to 3.0mph (4.8km/h) the RDS300 will allow you to maximize your underwater dive experience. Featuring a depth rating of 100ft (30m) and 2 level rotational speed control* the RDS300 is perfect for the recreational diving enthusiast.

 * Run up to 1.5 hours with normal use.
 * Rated to 100ft / 30m.
 * Speed up to 3 mph / 4.8 km/h.
 * 2-level rotational speed control (for US model) *Single Speed Control (for EU model).
 * Waterproof construction prevents accidental flooding.
 * Impact resistant heavy duty rubber hull protection.
 * Superior safety features include: auto shut off when triggers are released, thermal switch function and water leakage sensor.
 * Removable buoyancy control chamber (The RDS300 is designed for use in salt water. It will have less buoyancy in fresh water, and may slowly sink in fresh bodies of water).
 * Powered by a Sealed Lead Acid Battery (Occasional battery maintenance required).
 * Product size: 24” x 15.2” x 12.3” / 612 x 385 x 312 (mm)
 * Weight just 18 lbs / 8.2 kg including battery.
feature_bullets: YAMAHA RDS250 SEASCOOTER – Delivers a perfect balance of run time and speed. Rated to a depth of 100ft (30m) the RDS250 will cruise at speeds up to 2. 5mph (4km/h)
FEATURING – A run time up to 2 hours and the RDS250 is perfect vehicle for back to back dive days
WATERPROOF CONSTRUCTION - Prevents accidental flooding is impact resistant heavy duty rubber hull protection
REMOVABLE BUOYANCY - Control chamber (The RDS250) is designed for use in salt water. It will have less buoyancy in fresh water, and may slowly sink in fresh bodies of water
POWERED - By a sealed Lead Acid Battery included, Product size: 24” x 15. 2” x 12. 3” / 612 x 385 x 312 (mm), Weight just 18 lbs. / 8. 2 kg including battery (Occasional battery maintenance required)
CAMERA INTEGRATION - With built-in mount allows users to seamlessly take videos of their experience using their sport camera of choice (Camera/GoPro sold separately)

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
